.table usage
.table definition
tc.undefinedVar{name: V} :-
  usage{name: V} &
  !definition{name: V}.
----
application/json
[
  [
    "tc.undefinedVar"
  ],
  [
    "usage"
  ],
  [
    "definition"
  ]
]

.table edge
reachable{from: A, to: C} :-
  edge{from: A, to: C} |
  edge{from: A, to: B} &
  reachable{from: B, to: C}.
----
application/json
[
  [
    "reachable"
  ],
  [
    "edge"
  ]
]
